output_list.description: The transfer function does not check for integer overflow when adding the transferred amount to the recipient's balance. This can lead to an incorrect balance calculation and potentially loss of funds.

The transferFrom function does not check for integer overflow when adding the transferred amount to the recipient's balance. This can lead to an incorrect balance calculation and potentially loss of funds.
The mintToken function does not check for integer overflow when adding the minted amount to the target's balance. This can lead to an incorrect balance calculation and potentially loss of funds.

The buy function does not check for integer overflow when calculating the amount of tokens to be transferred to the sender. This can lead to an incorrect balance calculation and potentially loss of funds.

The sell function does not check for integer overflow when calculating the amount of tokens to be transferred from the sender. This can lead to an incorrect balance calculation and potentially loss of funds.
